text:
Are you still unsure how to
formulate questions in English?

Do you feel you need to review your
question forms?

Then join me in this free class, which is
all about
asking questions in English.
Hello and welcome everyone. This is Minoo at Anglo-Link.

In this class, we're going to review
question forms
using a variety of question words
and tenses. So, to join the class

you need to have at least
pre-intermediate level of English.

If the live class time is not suitable
for you,

you can still enrol and watch the class
recording

afterwards. To gain maximum benefit from
this lesson,
I suggest that you first watch my YouTube lesson
on questions and take the pre-class quiz.

To watch my YouTube lesson on
questions, click here.
To take the pre-class quiz, join the class
by clicking on "Join Free Webinar".
In the class,
we're going to go through the pre-class quiz and look at the possible mistakes

you may have made and then you can ask
me any additional questions you have
about formulating questions. After the class,

I will post study sheet on questions for
you

and also a post-class quiz for further
practice

and assimilation. So, if you feel you need
to review your question forms in English,

then join this free webinar now.
Thank you for watching
I look forward to seeing you in class!
